metadata.title: CVE-2022-2505 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugspresent in Firefox 102. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 102.1, Firefox < 103, and Thunderbird < 102.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
